description.fsit.riding.radius: The distance around a player where you can interact to ride them.
description.fsit.sittable.blocks: List of block types (e.g., "minecraft:oak_log") you can sit on.
description.fsit.sittable.enabled: Allows sitting on specific blocks by interacting with them.
description.fsit.sittable.radius: The distance around you where you can interact to sit on blocks.
description.fsit.sittable.tags: List of block tags (e.g., "minecraft:logs") defining sittable blocks.
description.fsit.use_server: Whether to use the server-side configuration
